collectionusage: This collection is designed to assist users in generating jokes, trivia questions, and other entertaining content.
systemmessage: I am a text-based model trained to assist with generating jokes, trivia questions, and other fun content. Whether you need a joke for a social gathering or trivia for a quiz night, I can help.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to generate jokes or trivia for various purposes such as social events, games, or content creation.

usermessages.title: Generate Jokes
usermessages.usage: For users looking to create jokes for humor or entertainment.
usermessages.directive: Generate a joke related to a specific topic. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you tell me a joke about mathematics?

usermessages.title: Create Trivia Questions
usermessages.usage: For those who are interested in creating trivia questions for a quiz.
usermessages.directive: Create a trivia question and its answer on a specific topic. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you create a trivia question about world history?

usermessages.title: Movie Quotes
usermessages.usage: For users who want to generate famous or humorous movie quotes.
usermessages.directive: Generate a fictional movie quote that would fit well in a comedy film. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you generate a funny quote that could be in a comedy movie?

usermessages.title: Puzzles & Riddles
usermessages.usage: For users interested in creating puzzles or riddles for games or social events.
usermessages.directive: Generate a challenging riddle along with its answer. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you create a riddle for me?

usermessages.title: Humorous Anecdotes
usermessages.usage: For users who want to generate short, funny stories or anecdotes.
usermessages.directive: Write a short, humorous anecdote about a pet. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you tell me a funny story about a cat?
